abstract.original_text: Bronchiolitis is a common cause of hospitalization among infants. The limited effectiveness of conventional medication has prompted the use of complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) as alternative or adjunctive therapy for the management of bronchiolitis.

sentences.segment_text: Bronchiolitis is a common cause of hospitalization among infants .
The limited effectiveness of conventional medication has prompted the use of complementary and alternative medicine ( CAM ) as alternative or adjunctive therapy for the management of bronchiolitis .
